title: oregon_testimony
abstract:
Prepared Statement
Statement of Carl Malamud, Public.Resource.Org
Before the Legislative Counsel Committee, Oregon State Legislature
June 19, 2008
Senate President Courtney, Speaker Merkley, Honorable Members of the Legislative 
Counsel Committee.  Thank you for the opportunity to appear before you today to 
discuss the issue of copyright and the Oregon Revised Statutes.  My name is Carl 
Malamud and I am the President and CEO of Public.Resource.Org, a 501(c)(3) nonproﬁt 
corporation which makes
